channel.title: Adding hp (not with that npc.cfg file)
channel.description: Im refering to hybrid scape- the downlaoded one :cool: how do i add hp to the monsters i was told that npc.cfg was found in the testscape folsder but since im using downloaded one there is no testscape folder

item.title: Adding hp (not with that npc.cfg file)
item.dc:creator: @Phonecheck Phonecheck
item.description:
@Phonecheck wrote:

wow,well anyways go to your hybridscape folder and click on npc.cfg inside it.Search for the npc whos health you wanna change and change it.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding hp (not with that npc.cfg file)
item.dc:creator: @dracar dracar
item.description:
@dracar wrote:

The testscape folder is another source, hybridscape is a blank made for one person play, you canâ€™t edit it. If you download testscape source or cheezscape, or one of the many other server sources, then you just open and edit the npc.cfg
